metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23423 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: This affects the package bikeshed before 3.0.0. This can occur when an untrusted source file containing include, include-code or include-raw block is processed. The contents of arbitrary files could be disclosed in the HTML output.

criterions.comment: bikeshed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
